mapper.sql: order_issued_id , flow_id , supply_id , supply_name , issued_status , issued_count , create_time , update_time , cus_relationship , is_scan
flow_id , supply_id , supply_name , issued_status , issued_count , create_time , update_time , cus_relationship , is_scan

order_issued_id , flow_id , supply_id , supply_name , issued_status , issued_count , date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time , date_format(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time , cus_relationship , is_scan , erp_order_code
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_order_issued
flow_id=#{flowId},
supply_id=#{supplyId},
supply_name=#{supplyName},
issued_status=#{issuedStatus},
issued_count=#{issuedCount},
create_time=str_to_date(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
update_time=str_to_date(#{updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
cus_relationship= #{cusRelationship} ,
is_scan= #{isScan}
WHERE flow_id =#{flowId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS totalcount FROM t_order_issued WHERE 1=1

SELECT O.FLOW_ID, O.ORG_TOTAL, O.SUPPLY_ID, O.SUPPLY_NAME, date_format(O.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CREATE_TIME, O.LEAVE_MESSAGE, O.ORDER_ID, PUO.cust_code_erp AS CUST_ID, SPT.PAY_TYPE FROM T_ORDER O, t_cust_erp_relation PUO, T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE SPT WHERE 1=1 AND O.CUST_ID = PUO.cust_code_yc AND PUO.relation_status='2' AND O.SUPPLY_ID = PUO.seller_code AND SPT.PAY_TYPE_ID = O.pay_type_id
AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5' AND SPT.PAY_TYPE=1
AND(
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
)
AND O.SUPPLY_ID in
#{supplyId}
AND O.flow_id in
#{flowId}
AND O.create_time < DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE( #{endDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND O.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE( #{startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND O.create_time >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 month)

SELECT O.FLOW_ID, O.ORG_TOTAL, O.SUPPLY_ID, O.SUPPLY_NAME, date_format(O.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CREATE_TIME, O.LEAVE_MESSAGE, O.ORDER_ID, PUO.cust_code_erp AS CUST_ID, SPT.PAY_TYPE FROM T_ORDER O LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_ISSUED OI ON O.FLOW_ID =OI.FLOW_ID INNER JOIN t_cust_erp_relation PUO ON O.CUST_ID = PUO.cust_code_yc AND O.SUPPLY_ID = PUO.seller_code and PUO.relation_status='2' LEFT JOIN T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE SPT ON SPT.PAY_TYPE_ID = O.PAY_TYPE_ID WHERE O.SUPPLY_ID = #{supplyId} AND (OI.ISSUED_STATUS = 0 OR OI.ISSUED_STATUS IS NULL) AND (3 > OI.ISSUED_COUNT OR OI.ISSUED_COUNT IS NULL)
AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5' AND SPT.PAY_TYPE=1
AND(
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
)
SELECT OD.PRODUCT_ID , OD.PRODUCT_COUNT, OD.PRODUCT_PRICE, OD.SUPPLY_ID, OD.SPU_CODE, OD.PRODUCT_CODE, OD.order_detail_id FROM T_ORDER_DETAIL OD WHERE OD.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}

SELECT
FROM t_order_issued WHERE flow_id = #{flowId} limit 1

SELECT OI.FLOW_ID,O.ORDER_ID,OI.erp_order_code FROM T_ORDER_ISSUED OI LEFT JOIN T_ORDER O ON O.FLOW_ID =OI.FLOW_ID LEFT JOIN T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE SPT ON O.pay_type_id=SPT.PAY_TYPE_ID WHERE OI.SUPPLY_ID=#{supplyId} AND OI.issued_status='1'
AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5' AND SPT.PAY_TYPE=1
AND(
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
)

SELECT O.FLOW_ID, O.SUPPLY_ID, O.SUPPLY_NAME, date_format(O.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time , O.cust_id FROM T_ORDER O LEFT JOIN T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE SPT ON SPT.PAY_TYPE_ID = O.PAY_TYPE_ID WHERE O.SUPPLY_ID = #{supplyId}
AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5' AND SPT.PAY_TYPE=1
AND(
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
)
AND (concat(O.cust_id ,',',O.SUPPLY_ID) NOT in (SELECT concat(IFNULL(cust_code_yc,'') ,',',seller_code )from t_cust_erp_relation WHERE relation_status='2') )

SELECT O.FLOW_ID, O.ORG_TOTAL, O.SUPPLY_ID, O.SUPPLY_NAME, O.CREATE_TIME, O.LEAVE_MESSAGE, O.ORDER_ID, PUO.cust_code_erp AS CUST_ID, SPT.PAY_TYPE FROM T_ORDER O LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_ISSUED OI ON O.FLOW_ID =OI.FLOW_ID INNER JOIN t_cust_erp_relation PUO ON O.CUST_ID = PUO.cust_code_yc AND O.SUPPLY_ID = PUO.seller_code and PUO.relation_status='2' LEFT JOIN T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE SPT ON SPT.PAY_TYPE_ID = O.PAY_TYPE_ID WHERE O.SUPPLY_ID = #{supplyId} AND (OI.ISSUED_STATUS = 0 OR OI.ISSUED_STATUS IS NULL) AND (3 = OI.ISSUED_COUNT OR OI.ISSUED_COUNT IS NULL) AND OI.cus_relationship = 0
AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5' AND SPT.PAY_TYPE=1
AND(
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
(SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayOffline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{PayPeriodTerm} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '1')
OR (SPT.PAY_TYPE=#{payOnline} AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '5')
)
